channel.title: Replication on RBAC ATLAS
channel.description: Recent content in Replication on RBAC ATLAS

item.title: postgresql
item.description:
Description

PostgreSQL (Postgres) is an open source object-relational database known for reliability and data integrity. ACID-compliant, it supports foreign keys, joins, views, triggers and stored procedures.

  • https://github.com/bitnami/charts/tree/main/bitnami/postgresql

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
postgresql default âŒ â€” 0 1 â€”

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ğŸ¤– postgresql

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ

ğŸ”‘ Permissions (0)

No explicit RBAC bindings.

item.title: volsync
item.description:
Description

Asynchronous data replication for Kubernetes

  • https://github.com/backube/volsync

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
volsync default âŒ â€” 33 2 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ğŸ¤– volsync

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ

ğŸ”‘ Permissions (33)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags

ClusterRole volsync-manager batch/jobs create Â· delete Â· deletecollection Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Critical PotentialPrivilegeEscalation PrivilegeEscalation Tampering WorkloadLifecycle
Role volsync-leader-election coordination.k8s.io/leases create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Critical ControlPlaneDisruption CriticalNamespace DenialOfService Tampering

ClusterRole volsync-manager core/pods/log get Â· list Â· watch High ClusterWideLogAccess DataExposure InformationDisclosure LogAccess
